Scrap Metal.description: Fragments of hulls, machinery, and forgotten satellites. Ubiquitous and versatile, if low quality. Essential for basic repairs and rudimentary construction.

Silicon Chunks.description: Raw, unrefined silicon harvested from asteroids or planetary crusts. Foundation for basic electronics and glass production.

Hydrocarbon Gas.description: Commonly found gases trapped in asteroid fields or vented from gas giants. Used primarily for basic fuel and polymer synthesis.

Base Metallic Ore.description: A generic mix of common metallic ores like iron and nickel. Requires significant refining but is readily available.

Raw Crystal Shards.description: Unprocessed crystalline structures with minor energy conductive properties. Often found near spatial anomalies.

Exotic Gas Cloud Sample.description: A volatile sample collected from nebulae containing unusual isotopes. Potentially useful in advanced energy or propulsion.

Titanium Ore Deposit.description: Naturally occurring ore rich in titanium. Prized for its strength-to-weight ratio after refining.

Unstable Isotope Cluster.description: A small, faintly glowing rock emitting low-level radiation. Requires careful handling but contains potent energy potential.

Raw Bioluminescent Fungi.description: Strange fungi harvested from damp, dark corners of derelicts or exotic planets. Used in pharmaceuticals and specialized lighting.

Precursor Alloy Fragment.description: A piece of an unknown, ancient alloy exhibiting unusual structural properties. Found only in Precursor ruins.

Cryo-Ice Core.description: A sample drilled from deep within comets or ice moons, containing trapped gases and minerals from the early solar system.

Zero-G Plant Spores.description: Hardy spores capable of growing in microgravity. Cultivated for exotic foods or atmospheric processing.

Charged Plasma Condensate.description: Semi-stable plasma trapped in electromagnetic fields, harvested from stellar phenomena. Extremely energetic.

Quantum Foam Residue.description: Trace amounts of exotic matter collected from localized spacetime distortions. Highly unpredictable but potentially revolutionary.

Void Crystal Matrix.description: A complex, naturally occurring lattice of Void Crystal, humming with contained energy. Found only in deep, uncharted space.

Basic Alloy Ingot.description: Refined from common ores. Forms the backbone of most standard construction and hull plating.

Processed Silicon Wafer.description: Purified silicon sliced into wafers. Essential for manufacturing basic semiconductors and computer components.

Standard Polymer Resin.description: A versatile plastic derived from refined hydrocarbons. Used for casings, insulation, and low-stress components.

Refined Hydrocarbons (Fuel Grade).description: Processed gas suitable for standard ship drives and power generators. Relatively stable and efficient.

Conductive Wiring Bundle.description: Basic copper or aluminum wiring, insulated and bundled. Used for power transmission in simple systems.

Tempered Plasteel Sheet.description: An improved alloy combining metal strength with polymer resilience. Standard for mid-grade hull plating and structural supports.

Purified Crystal Resonator.description: Refined crystal shards tuned to specific frequencies. Used in basic sensors and energy focusing arrays.

Enriched Isotope Fuel Rod.description: Processed isotopes formed into relatively stable fuel rods. Powers advanced ship reactors and certain high-energy weapons.

Refined Titanium Plate.description: High-purity titanium plating offering excellent protection and heat resistance for its weight.

Bio-Enhancement Gel.description: A processed gel derived from bioluminescent fungi, used in medical treatments and cybernetic interfaces.

Woven Carbon Nanomesh.description: Extremely strong, lightweight mesh created from carbon nanotubes. Used in advanced composites and armor.

Cryo-Stabilized Gas.description: Rare gases extracted from ice cores, stabilized at extremely low temperatures. Used in advanced cooling systems and research.

Precursor Power Conduit.description: A section of refined Precursor alloy, seemingly designed to channel immense energy with zero loss. Its function is barely understood.

Hyper-Dense Plating.description: An incredibly dense but workable material created under extreme pressures. Offers unparalleled protection but is very heavy.

Stabilized Plasma Canister.description: Charged plasma carefully contained within portable magnetic bottles. Used as ammunition for plasma weaponry or burst energy sources.

Zero-Point Energy Tap.description: A device that seemingly draws minuscule amounts of energy from vacuum fluctuations, refined from Quantum Foam Residue. Highly experimental.

Perfected Crystal Lens.description: A flawless lens cut from a Void Crystal Matrix, capable of focusing energy or light with absolute precision.

Cultivated Zero-G Algae.description: Nutrient-rich algae grown from Zero-G spores. A staple food source on stations and long-haul vessels.
